title: Laudanum
content:
i tried to make an extrme black sans serif .   
but now i don't know what to do with it.   
i didn't want to have contrast, but i did because of optical reasons and width. it is just not right, but what is wrong?   
MvM   
   
 ![laudanum](http://web.archive.org/web/20140807003931im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/27538.gif)
author: mvm

comments.content: You might be interested in a workshop directed by the men of [Underware](http://web.archive.org/web/20140807003931/http:/underware.hl/). The focus of the project was ["How fat can you go?"](http://web.archive.org/web/20140807003931/http:/www.typeworkshop.com/index.php?id1=Helsinki_Lahti_10_2002&id2=06&id3=pres2) Perhaps you need to really explore what phat letters are, and then work backwards to find the corrections?
BTW What does "laudanum" have to do with your design?
